ing: 1 (10 ounce) package mixed baby lettuces and spring greens
1/4 cup balsamic vinaigrette salad dressing, or to taste
des: "This easy, bright salad perks up roast chicken or other simple meal. Try adding strips of grilled chicken for a meal on its own!"
ins: In a large salad bowl, gently mix together the baby greens, pecans, berries, and blue cheese. Toss with balsamic vinaigrette.
